title: A beautiful 3 bed, 2 bath townhome for rent
description:
You don't want to miss this gorgeous family home in the absolute perfect location. Nestled on a large lot right where you want to be, you will love this like-new (near Graduate Hospital) townhome close to all the best that Southwest Center City has to offer. Step inside this 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home where you will immediately adore the bright and modern open concept entertainment space. Natural light filters in through the entire home, highlighting the gorgeous hardwood floors and spacious floor plan. The living room and dining area are completely open to the beautiful/modern kitchen where the chef of the family will feel right at home among the stainless-steel appliances, luxe granite countertops and plenty of black stained oak cabinets. Outside the entertainment space continues on your huge patio, fully fenced in and with plenty of shade. Lounge with your favorite book or take in a meal al fresco on a gorgeous summer day. The second floor houses the first two bedrooms and full bathroom as well as the conveniently placed laundry area. On the third floor find the master bedroom plus a gorgeous spa-like bathroom with spectacular walk-in shower and beautiful soaker tub. The lowest level of the home is a fully finished basement where you will find bonus living space plus plenty of room for storage. A truly gorgeous home in a great location, this one won't last long. Don't let it pass you by! contact today to schedule your private showing!

title: Wonderful opportunity to live in the historic landmark Colonnade Build
description:
Built in 1932 as The Wills Eyes Institute, today it has blossomed into a beautiful condo conversion with modern amenities including a doorman, secured entrance, and a gorgeous atrium that is currently under renovation with a world-class designer. This is moderate-sized boutique building is home to 115 units. Unit 409 is newly renovated with state-of-the-art finishes. Stainless steel appliances, gorgeous warm chestnut cabinets with built-in diamond wine rack, and glass bar. onyx granite counters with flecks of gold. Venetian stone backsplash with gilded rope details with an elaborate crystal chandelier over the kitchen island. Blonde kitchen floor tiles. Maple hardwood floors in the living area and bedroom with nice size closets and windows for plenty of natural light. Custom designer paint throughout. Enter into the master bath with Venetian stone tile with sea glass accents and a custom vanity mirror with Frigidaire stackable washer and dryer. The building is equipped with a fitness room and storage area in the basement. Walking distance to essentially everything Philly has to offer. Subway, bus lines, 76, 95, Center City, Kelly Drive area cafes, music venues, restaurants, fitness centers, boot camps, and Crossfit. You want it, we got it! This lovely home can come partially furnished with two comfortable leather couches, a small dining table, and a fully stocked kitchen (utensils, pots/pans, etc.) for 50 more a month.

description:

title: RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BED, 1 BATH CORNER UNIT, WITH 2-CAR PARKING!
description:
Tucked away in Philly's vibrant Queen Village neighborhood, 830 S Howard St #2 is a recently renovated 2 bed, 1 bath corner unit, with 2-car parking, sat on the top level of a duplex. An idyllic courtyard, with gardens and picnic seating, welcomes you at the front of the building. Inside the unit, soaring cathedral ceilings and new luxury flooring frame the bright and airy living room. This space is filled with natural light from 3 windows and a skylight, while a 4th window brightens the separate dining area. The kitchen is fitted with new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and plenty of cabinet & counter space. There's also room for extra storage or a small table. Down the hall, you'll find a sleek full bathroom adorned with modern fixtures, a glass-enclosed shower, and an updated vanity. Completing the unit are two spacious bedrooms. The primary bedroom has a wet-bar and a pair of sliding doors leading to a Trex deck spanning the unit's width. The building's shared laundry area is on the ground floor, along with an entry from this unit's one garage parking spot and one driveway spot. 830 S Howard's fantastic Queen Village location earns a Walk Score of 93! Nearby South St features markets, restaurants, and cafes, including Whole Foods, ACME, Good Karma, and Bridget Foy's. South of Washington Ave, neighborhood favorites Herman's Coffee, Charlie's Roast Pork, and Pennsport Beer Boutique line E Moyamensing Ave. Shot Tower playground & rec center and Jefferson Sq Park are a few blocks away, plus Target, Acme, Wine & Spirits, Ikea, and Lowes are close by. There's also easy access to public transit, Old City, I-95, and South Jersey via I-76. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!
830 S Howard Street Ct #2
